snippet: Phylicia Rashad, who played Bill Cosby’s wife on two sitcoms, defends him against accusations of sexual assault.
abstract: Phylicia Rashad, who played Bill Cosby’s wife on two sitcoms, defends him against accusations of sexual assault.

headline.main: Phylicia Rashad Defends Cosby, Saying 'Forget' His Accusers
headline.print_headline: Rashad Defends Cosby, Saying ‘Forget’ His Accusers
